name: Obanai
description: Telegram Group Management Bot made madee with pyrogram library in python.

BOT_TOKEN.description: paste your telegram bot token made using @botfather

ASSISTANT_ID.description: enter I'd of which uh have used to string (Id) Go to @Zaid2_Robot And Type /id..

STRING_SESSION.description: fill with the telethon session string from https://replit.com/@Itz-zaid/Generator

SUPPORT.description: Fill there your group username else leave

CHANNEL.description: Fill there your Channel username else leave

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS_ID.description: Sudo users have full access to everythin, don't trust anyone... ex:- 123456 654321 123456

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: For logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

ARQ_API_URL.description: For Music Downloading And Many More Things... Don't change this value

MESSAGE_DUMP_CHAT.description: Chat_id of the group where useless things will go

RSS_DELAY.description: Delay in which RSS will send updates in chat

DEV_USERS.description: Dev Access Of Your Bot (Id) Go to @Zaid2_Robot And Type /id..
